summary: Add several npcs, quests, guild, locations... Not finished as it is in beta.
descriptionHtml: This mod aims at adding a much more diverse and realistic bounty system. There will be around three bounty guilds each competing against the other. You will receive the same quest from all three but you must chose one to turn in to. Each will have there own rewards. Many new followers, quest givers, merchants and enemies will be added along with amazing new remote locations. Its is a work in progress and far from completion.
author: Telahas
